title: Eurobike Sports Tech Roundup…and COROS Dura Delay
content:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, Ray and Des talk about the huge slate of Eurobike announcements from Elite and JetBlack along with the COROS Dura being delayed until Sept. 2024.

Below are the chapter/topic markers for this FIT File interview:

0:00 JetBlack Victory Trainer
7:06 Zwift vs Industry Standards
13:26 Elite Justo 2 & Avanti
22:45 Elite Square Smart Trainer Frame
25:25 Is the Elite Square Ugly Looking?
35:34 Are Smart Bike Frames Under or Overpriced?
39:35 GPLAMA Breaking Ray’s KICKR Bike
45:46 The COROS Delay Mess

Thanks to Precision Fuel & Hydration, where you can get 15% off your first order.  Additionally, check out their free Fuel & Hydration Planner.

Thanks to The Pros Closet (TPC), where you can get $40 off an order of $200 or more with coupon code: 2024FITFILE40

Thanks for listening!
author: Ray Maker
